data.message: I love Ed Sheeran music: his voice, song lyrics, such an inspiration. Also, my partners dream is to meet Ed even more than I want, and he always wanted to sing with him together. Everytime we going somewhere he puts Eds music in the car and sing along and this are such a great moments, like their voices actually belong to each other😍 Ed is inspiration for him. I wish we both could see him one day or at least my partner
